column1: Uchi////We stood waiting for an hour and 15 minutes because the outside tables were full
column3: everything was full and there was no place to sit.  After standing that long
column4: I decided to order our food to go.  We finally got a table outside and were hoping we could eat our dinner there since by now it was an hour and 40 minutes that we had waited
column5: but they said we couldn't.  We ate our dinner in the car
column6: in the parking lot.  For the drive over there
column7: and the time we stood waiting
column8: the food wasn't good enough to be worth doing again.
